overview: A collection of four reels of wonderfully stencilled fashion compilation films from the 1910s and 1920s with meticulous details and an amazingly vibrant but sometimes also a sensitive, restrained colour palette. The first of the four films, Parijsche Mode No. 25, was recently preserved at Haghefilm Digitaal. (Annike Kross)
title: Parijsche Mode No. 25
